The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. ( French version also available ).
full_summary:
# Tender Notice: Forklift Trucks
### Solicitation Number: W8476-246824/A
#### Reference Number: cb-14-23262274

The Department of National Defence is inviting bids for the supply of eight (8) propane engine driven forklift trucks, along with training and related items. The procurement is being made under Supply Arrangement E60HS-21FRKL, with Configuration A, B, and C.

**Key Details:**

*   Solicitation Closing Date: **February 29, 2024, 14:00 Hrs** (Note: previously amended to February 29, 2024, from February 22, 2024)
*   Expected Delivery Date: 180 days from receipt of order (ARO)
*   Languages of Submission: English or French

**Eligibility Requirements:**

*   Suppliers must hold a Supply Arrangement (SA) under Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) E60HS-21FRKL/A
*   Interested vendors may self-register and receive notification when pre-qualified under the SA by visiting [CanadaBuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities/tender-notice/pw-hs-653-79868)

**Notice and Procurement:**

*   The notice is published on [CanadaBuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities/tender-notice/pw-hs-653-79868) for a period of 27 calendar days
*   The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on this procurement

**Important Notes:**

*   Documents may be submitted in either English or French
*   This solicitation is only for suppliers that meet the requirements above
*   Pre-qualified vendors with E60HS-21FRKL/A may submit bids through CanadaBuys

**Points of Contact:**

*   Name: Dong Le
*   Email: [dong.le@forces.gc.ca](mailto:dong.le@forces.gc.ca)
*   Phone: (999) 999-9999
*   Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON, CANADA, K1A 0K2

Thank you for your collaboration in handling this complex document. 
I will make sure I get this right and deliver the rewritten version to you as soon as possible. Have a nice day. 

            Best regards,
            [Your Name] 


ANSWER:

T
